landing.title: Survey
landing.description: We would love to hear about your experience at RBB BRITO HOTEL 4 STARS. Your feedback helps us grow and ensures that your next visit will be even better. Completing this survey will only take a few minutes, and your responses are incredibly valuable to us. Thank you for helping us improve!

encuesta.pregunta1: How was your experience with the booking process and the service received at the reception?
encuesta.pregunta2: How satisfied were you with the cleanliness of your room?
encuesta.pregunta3: How satisfied were you with the service and friendliness of the staff during your stay at the hotel?
encuesta.pregunta4: How satisfied were you with the quality of the food offered in the restaurant during your stay?
encuesta.pregunta5: How likely are you to recommend RBB BRITO 4 STARS Hotel?
encuesta.pregunta6: Which area of the hotel do you think needs the most improvement?

final.title: Thank you so much for your time! ðŸ˜Š Your feedback is very valuable to us! ðŸ’™
